tags.name: tokens
tags.description: Query token balances, transfers, prices etc.

tags.name: resolve
tags.description: Resolve various kinds of blockchain data, like addresses, block numbers, contracts etc

get.description: Get a list of webhooks or a single webhook by ID

schema.description: The webhook ID to request the data for

post.description: Create a new webhook. In order to receive decoded data, specify a partial ABI in the filters.

delete.description: Delete a webhook. This action cannot be undone.

post.description: Test your webhook URL. This will send a test event to the webhook URL signed with an example secret 'test123'. NB! The payload does not necessarily match your webhook filters. You can however use it to test signature verification and payload format handling.

schema.description:
The chain ID(s) to request the data for. You can specify multiple chain IDs, up to a maximum of 50.
      Use repeated query parameters, e.g., `?chain=20&chain=56`.
      Optional, because a single chain can as well be specified as a subdomain

get.description: Get ERC-20 balances for a given address

schema.description:
The chain ID(s) to request the data for. You can specify multiple chain IDs, up to a maximum of 50.
      Use repeated query parameters, e.g., `?chain=20&chain=56`.
      Optional, because a single chain can as well be specified as a subdomain
The number of items to return
Whether to include metadata for the tokens
Whether to resolve metadata IPFS or Arweave links
Whether to include spam tokens

get.description: Get price in USD for given token(s)

schema.description:
The chain ID(s) to request the data for. You can specify multiple chain IDs, up to a maximum of 50.
      Use repeated query parameters, e.g., `?chain=20&chain=56`.
      Optional, because a single chain can as well be specified as a subdomain
The address of the token to get the price for
The symbol of the token to get the price for
Timestamp in seconds or milliseconds
Whether to include historical token prices
Whether to include the number of holders

chain_id.description: The chain ID of a relevant entry

percent_change_24h.description: Percent change in price over the last 24 hours

volume_24h_usd.description: Volume in USD over the last 24 hours

volume_change_24h.description: Percent change in volume over the last 24 hours

get.description: Look up a fungible token by symbol

schema.description:
The symbol(s) of the token to lookup. You can specify multiple symbols, up to a maximum of 10.
      Use repeated query parameters, e.g., `?symbol=ETH&symbol=USDC`.

The chain ID(s) to request the data for. You can specify multiple chain IDs, up to a maximum of 50.
      Use repeated query parameters, e.g., `?chain=20&chain=56`.
      Optional, because a single chain can as well be specified as a subdomain

chain_id.description: The chain ID of a relevant entry
